resources.string: Adjusts the app colors to your background
Activates darkmode compatibility with the timetable and zooms it up
Shows the timetables of the last 8 weeks. Timetables may be incorrect and belong to another class
The app was developed with the programming language Kotlin using the Jetpack Compose framework. The JSoup library is used so that the app can load the timetables from the school server

Changes the horizontal padding of the timetable 0 is max
Unlocks the teachers\' timetables. Requires username and password to be set
Uses its own view for timetables. Inspired by Google Calendar
